name: StationaryCompressedGasOxygenTherapyDevice
title: Stationary Compressed Gas Oxygen Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Compressed gas oxygen therapy devices for use in the home that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Stationary compressed gas oxygen therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Compressed gas oxygen therapy devices for use in the home that are designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Compressed gas oxygen therapy devices designed to remain in one place while operating.)
